00020   void EventParameterWriteEngine::registerParameters()
00021   {
00022     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_prefix",
00023                                                    "engine prefix for running multiple instances",
00024                                                    _enginePrefix, std::string("event_") );
00025 
00026     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_FloatParameters",
00027                                                    "names of float parameters",
00028                                                    _floatParameters, _floatParameters );
00029 
00030     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_IntParameters",
00031                                                    "names of int parameters",
00032                                                    _intParameters, _intParameters );
00033 
00034     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_FloatVecParameters",
00035                                                    "names of FloatVec parameters",
00036                                                    _floatVecParameters, _floatVecParameters );
00037 
00038     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_IntVecParameters",
00039                                                    "names of IntVec parameters",
00040                                                    _intVecParameters, _intVecParameters );
00041 
00042   }
00043 
00044   void EventParameterWriteEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00045   {
00046     _intValues.resize(_intParameters.size(),0);
00047     _floatValues.resize(_floatParameters.size(),0);
00048     _nIntValues.resize(_intVecParameters.size(),0);
00049     _nFloatValues.resize(_floatVecParameters.size(),0);
00050     _intVecValues.resize(_intVecParameters.size());
00051     _floatVecValues.resize(_floatVecParameters.size());
00052 
00053 
00054     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < _intParameters.size(); ++i)
00055       hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+_intParameters[i]).c_str() ,&(_intValues[i]),(_enginePrefix+_intParameters[i]+"/I").c_str() );
00056 
00057     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < _floatParameters.size(); ++i)
00058       hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+_floatParameters[i]).c_str() ,&(_floatValues[i]),(_enginePrefix+_floatParameters[i]+"/F").c_str() );
00059 
00060 
00061     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < _intVecParameters.size(); ++i) {
00062 
00063       std::string sizeName = _enginePrefix+"_N_"+_intVecParameters[i];
00064 
00065       hostTree->Branch( sizeName.c_str() ,&(_nIntValues[i]),( sizeName + "/i").c_str() );
00066 
00067       _intVecBranches.push_back(hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+_intVecParameters[i]).c_str() ,&(_nIntValues[i]),(_enginePrefix+_intVecParameters[i]+"["+sizeName+"]/I").c_str() ) );
00068     }
00069 
00070 
00071     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < _floatVecParameters.size(); ++i) {
00072 
00073       std::string sizeName = _enginePrefix+"_N_"+_floatVecParameters[i];
00074 
00075       hostTree->Branch( sizeName.c_str() ,&(_nFloatValues[i]),( sizeName + "/i").c_str() );
00076 
00077       _floatVecBranches.push_back( hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+_floatVecParameters[i]).c_str() ,&(_nFloatValues[i]),(_enginePrefix+_floatVecParameters[i]+"["+sizeName+"]/F").c_str() ) );
00078     }
00079 
00080 
00081   }
00082 
00083 
00084   void EventParameterWriteEngine::fillVariables( EVENT::LCEvent* evt ) {
00085 
00086     for (unsigned int i=0; i < _intVecValues.size(); ++i) _intVecValues[i].clear();
00087     for (unsigned int i=0; i < _floatVecValues.size(); ++i) _floatVecValues[i].clear();
00088 
00089 
00090       for (unsigned int i=0; i < _intParameters.size(); ++i) _intValues[i] = evt->getParameters().getIntVal(_intParameters[i]);
00091       for (unsigned int i=0; i < _floatParameters.size(); ++i) _floatValues[i] = evt->getParameters().getFloatVal(_floatParameters[i]);
00092 
00093       for (unsigned int i=0; i < _intVecParameters.size(); ++i)  evt->getParameters().getIntVals( _intVecParameters[i], _intVecValues[i] );
00094       for (unsigned int i=0; i < _floatVecParameters.size(); ++i)  evt->getParameters().getFloatVals( _floatVecParameters[i], _floatVecValues[i] );
00095 
00096 
00097 
00098     for (unsigned int i=0; i < _intVecParameters.size(); ++i) {
00099       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " integer vector " << _intVecParameters[i] << " has " << _intVecValues[i].size() << " elements" << endl;
00100       _nIntValues[i] = _intVecValues[i].size();
00101       _intVecBranches[i]->SetAddress( &(_intVecValues[i][0])  );
00102     }
00103     for (unsigned int i=0; i < _floatVecParameters.size(); ++i) {
00104       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " float vector " << _floatVecParameters[i] << " has " << _floatVecValues[i].size() << " elements" << endl;
00105       _nFloatValues[i] = _floatVecValues[i].size();
00106       _floatVecBranches[i]->SetAddress( &(_floatVecValues[i][0])  );
00107     }
00108 
00109 
00110   }
00111 
00112 }//namespace marlin
